sections.heading: through 15-22-5 - Reserved
sections.text:
Code 1981, §§ 15-22-1 through 15-22-5, enacted by § Ga. L. 2015, p. 919, 3-1/HB 279; repealed pursuant to its own terms by § Ga. L. 2015, p. 919, 3-1/HB 279, effective June 30, 2020.
